title: Authors and Citation
text: Mansiaux Y (2025). blueskyR: R package interact Bluesky API. R package version 0.0.0.9000.
code: @Manual{,   title = {blueskyR: A R package to interact with the Bluesky API},   author = {Yohann Mansiaux},   year = {2025},   note = {R package version 0.0.0.9000}, }

title: Get bearer token — get_bearer_token
code: get_bearer_token(   handle = Sys.getenv("bluesky_id"),   password = Sys.getenv("bluesky_pwd"),   login_url = "https://bsky.social/xrpc/com.atproto.server.createSession" )

title: Get bearer token — get_bearer_token
text: handle Bluesky handle password Bluesky password login_url Bluesky login URL

what: Search posts for a given keyword — search_posts
title: Search posts for a given keyword — search_posts
Search posts for a given keyword — search_posts
code: search_posts(   keyword,   access_jwt,   max_posts = NULL,   search_url = "https://bsky.social/xrpc/app.bsky.feed.searchPosts" )

title: Search posts for a given keyword — search_posts
text: keyword Keyword search access_jwt Access token max_posts Maximum number posts retrieve search_url Search URL
